entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Friday 12 May 2023
